parameters.definition: Area occupied by one long desk
Number of employees that can be seated at one long desk
Area occupied by one short desk
Number of employees that can be seated at one short desk
Maximum area available for desks in the office

description: You are designing an office space with two types of desks: long desks and short desks. You can spend at most \param{MaxBudget}. Long desks cost \param{CostLongDesk}, take up \param{AreaLongDesk} square feet of space, and seat \param{SeatsLongDesk} employees. Short desks cost \param{CostShortDesk}, take up \param{AreaShortDesk} square feet of space, and seat \param{SeatsShortDesk} employees. The office can have at most \param{MaxArea} square feet of desks. How many of each desk should you buy in order to maximize the seating availability?
